about.name: Polyviam
about.desc: Polyviam is a growth strategy agency that helps startups and businesses to plan and consult growth strategies by identifying opportunities through the big three growth levers: Product, Brand, and Distribution.

projectTeam.desc: This landing page project consisted of a product designer and a UX researcher and took around 2 weeks to design, with ongoing Webflow development.

desc: The client needed an intuitive and visually appealing landing page that effectively communicates Polyviam’s core services and growth strategies.
The brief was to create a no-nonsense yet interactive design that keeps users hooked till the end.

goals.title: User Goal
goals.desc: Craft a visually engaging landing page to establish trust and credibility.

goals.title: Business Goal
desc: Highlight Polyviam’s unique methodology of leveraging Product, Brand, and Distribution for growth.
Follow the structure and vision the client had and turn it into reality, based on references provided by the client.
To have a minimal and non-distracting design, but with a visually engaging user experience throughout the website.
Unique transitions between various sections of the landing page were implemented to keep users hooked.
Showcase the content using illustrations and animations to enhance engagement and clarity.

targetAudience: Startup Founders: Startups with 100 to 200 team members, aspiring to scale their businesses.
Successful Founders: Seeking innovative strategies to optimize operations and expand their market reach.
discoveryPhase.uiInspiration: Analyzed multiple landing pages of competitors and client-provided references for the look and feel of the website.
discoveryPhase.ideaExploration: Iterated on hero sections and subsequent sections of the website, aligning with user goals and incorporating client feedback.

ui.approach: Crafted a clean, modern, and minimalistic interface ensuring a seamless user journey with visual hierarchy.
ui.colors: Balanced use of red, blue, and grey for professionalism and vibrancy. Subtle noise textures and gradients added depth and sophistication.
ui.typography: Used 'Inter Display' and 'Inter Tight' fonts for a contemporary and readable experience while keeping font sizes minimal.
ui.animations: Incorporated smooth scroll-triggered animations and fade-ins, including a silhouette overlay in the hero section for dynamic interactions.

achievements: Designed a visually engaging, minimal landing page that clearly communicated Polyviam's services and growth strategies.
Used unique transitions, illustrations, and animations to create an interactive user experience aligned with the client's vision.
